events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred on the previous night involving a collision at an intersection.
The claim was categorised as an Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and damages reported.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to manage the auto accident claim and assist the customer throughout the process.
The insurance company officially acknowledged the receipt of the auto accident claim and assured quick processing.
Customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and medical bills related to the accident.
All requested documents including accident photos, police report, and injury treatment bills were submitted by the customer.
The insurance adjuster commenced an investigation into the details and facts surrounding the vehicle collision incident.
Investigation was completed with all necessary verifications done, confirming the accident circumstances and liability.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the vehicle repairs and medical expenses resulting from the car accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the timely handling and fair settlement offer concerning the vehicle accident claim.
The insurance claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement terms.
Payment was issued to the customer's account to cover the approved repair and medical expenses after the accident.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after full settlement and payment were processed without issues.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
